name: Galaxy Runaway
description:
Amazing Space Adventure
You were abducted by Aliens
You have been waiting so long to return home
Now its time to Run

Galaxy Runaway

Clean up the way
Destroy the Enemy
Speed up with your vehicles
Complete all missions to reach the Earth

-Powerful Guns !!
-Amazing vehicles
-Different Levels
-Fantastic characters
-Skillfull characters
-Fascinating effects
-Future Game
publishers: CUBE GAMES YAZILIM SANAYI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
